backend/main.mo: Motoko canister defining user profiles, logs, rewards, and reminders with access control and multiple Map-based stores.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report listing offline-first, caching, and settings‑related features with associated files and metadata.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Collected summaries of various frontend components, hooks, and styles used across the app.
frontend/.env.example: Example environment file defining optional Internet Identity URL.
frontend/DEPLOYMENT_TROUBLESHOOTING.md: Guide outlining common deployment issues and solutions for the app.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base styles and custom CSS variables for light and dark themes.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point registering the service worker and bootstrapping the React app.
frontend/public/manifest.webmanifest: PWA manifest defining app name, icons, theming, and display behavior.
frontend/public/offline.html: Standalone offline fallback page with styled message and retry button.
frontend/public/sw.js: Service worker handling caching, offline fallback, and network-first fetch logic.
frontend/PWA.md: Documentation explaining PWA installation, offline behavior, updating, and troubleshooting.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main app component managing authentication flow, profile setup, and navigation between feature views.
frontend/src/components/auth/LoginButton: Login/logout button using Internet Identity with loading state and error handling.
frontend/src/components/auth/ProfileSetu: Modal prompting new users to enter and save their name during profile setup.
frontend/src/components/history/EmptySta: Displays a decorative empty state when no intake history is available.
frontend/src/components/history/HistoryV: Fetches and displays intake history with stats, offline notice, and daily progress cards.
frontend/src/components/intake/QuickAddI: Allows quick water intake logging, handles online/offline behavior, and triggers reward toasts.
frontend/src/components/intake/TodayProg: Displays today's hydration progress, streak, and goal celebration with offline and loading states.
frontend/src/components/layout/AppHeader: Renders the app header with logo, greeting, install button, and login control.
frontend/src/components/offline/OfflineS: Shows a warning when data is stale due to offline mode, including last-updated time.
frontend/src/components/pwa/InstallAppBu: Provides a button to trigger the PWA install prompt when available.
frontend/src/components/pwa/OfflineBanne: Displays a fixed banner warning the user when the app is offline.
frontend/src/components/reminders/InAppR: Shows an in-app notification banner for scheduled reminders with dismiss controls.
frontend/src/components/reminders/Remind: Manages custom reminders and streak-break settings with add, edit, toggle, and delete actions.
frontend/src/components/reminders/Streak: Initializes streak-break reminder logic without rendering UI.
frontend/src/components/rewards/BadgesGr: Renders a grid of reward badges, showing unlocked status and icons.
frontend/src/components/rewards/GoalCele: Shows a full-screen celebratory card when the hydration goal is achieved.
frontend/src/components/rewards/RewardsP: Displays reward stats including streak, completed goals, and earned badges.
frontend/src/components/running/RunHisto: Displays running history with stats, handles loading/offline states, and formats pace and time.
frontend/src/components/running/RunLogFo: Form to log a run with distance and duration, validating input and supporting offline queueing.
frontend/src/components/running/RunningV: Combines the run log form and history list into a single view.
frontend/src/components/settings/Setting: Settings form to update daily hydration goals and cup size with offline support and input validation.
frontend/src/components/sleep/SleepHisto: Displays sleep history with averages, progress indicators, and offline awareness.
frontend/src/components/sleep/SleepLogFo: Form to log hours slept with validation and offline queueing.
Combines sleep log form and sleep history list into one view.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and caches an authenticated or anonymous actor, refreshing dependent queries when identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides a React context and provider for Internet Identity auth, handling login, logout, stored identity loading, and auth-client creation.
frontend/src/hooks/useOnlineStatus.ts: Tracks browser online/offline status using window events.
frontend/src/hooks/usePWAInstallPrompt.t: Manages the deferred PWA install prompt, tracks installability, and exposes an install trigger.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks for fetching and mutating user data, with offline support and queuing for updates.
Schedules periodic hydration reminders using notifications or in‑app prompts, managing permissions and intervals.
frontend/src/hooks/useReminderSchedulerC: Provides a context-based reminder scheduler supporting multiple reminder types, notifications, and in‑app fallback.
frontend/src/hooks/useStreakBreakReminde: Fires streak‑break hydration reminders near end of day based on user streak, goals, and anti‑spam rules.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind layers, theme CSS variables, dark mode palette, utility animations, and global styles.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with React Query and Internet Identity providers and loads global CSS.
frontend/src/offline/offlineQueue.ts: Implements a per‑principal FIFO offline action queue with persistence through localStorage.
frontend/src/offline/offlineStorage.ts: Provides versioned, namespaced localStorage utilities for saving, reading, and clearing offline data.
frontend/src/offline/OfflineSyncProvider: Watches online status to replay queued offline actions, syncs them via the actor, and invalidates caches.
frontend/src/offline/useOfflinePreferenc: React hook storing the user’s offline‑saving preference in localStorage.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility helpers for reading, storing, and persisting URL parameters using URLSearchParams and sessionStorage.
frontend/src/vite-env.d.ts: Type definitions extending Vite’s import meta environment variables.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration extending colors, animations, containers, and theming based on CSS variables.
project_state.json: Describes the project’s state, including goals for admin-only analytics, gamification updates, and known issues like broken sleep badge logic and deployment errors.
